alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 04 at 6:05AM MST until August 04 at 8:45AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM MST THIS MORNING FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 605 AM MST, Gauge reports indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Tempe, Paradise Valley, North Mountain Park, Piestewa Peak Park, Metro Center Mall, Arizona State Fairgrounds, Downtown Glendale, Camelback Mountain, Papago Park and Downtown Scottsdale. Interstate 17 FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
